text: The Saturn Award for Best Streaming Horror & Thriller Series introduced at the 45th Saturn Awards, honoring the best streaming series in the genres of horror and thriller. (NOTE: Year refers to year of eligibility, the actual ceremonies are held the following year) ==Winners and Nominees== {| class="wikitable" width="550px" border="1" cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0" align="centre" |- ! width="70px"|Year ! TV Series ! title: Saturn Award for Best Streaming Horror & Thriller Series
